nopey.ibrextras.config.mainscreen.title: IBRExtras Configs
nopey.ibrextras.config.hudscreen.title: Pick your HUD Elements and move them around
nopey.ibrextras.tooltip.positioning: I like to move it, move it!
nopey.ibrextras.tooltip.textinfo:
Use variables to get extra information. Examples:
$speed - Speed in km/h
$speed:m/s - Speed in m/s
$speed:mph - Speed in mph
$speed:kt - Speed in knot
$name - Your username
$ping - duh
$angle - Turn angle
$g - g force
$fps - also duh
$inertia - Rotational Inertia
